Package io.permazen

Class JCollectionField

java.lang.Object
io.permazen.JSchemaItem
io.permazen.JField
io.permazen.JComplexField
io.permazen.JCollectionField
Direct Known Subclasses:
JListField, JSetField
public abstract class JCollectionField extends JComplexField
Represents a collection field in a JClass.
